name: Жидкое мыло для интимной гигиены Bodyart 500мл
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Decyl Glucoside, Glycerin, Inulin, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Lactic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract, Polyquaternium-7, Parfum, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone.
